title: Kids archaeology camp sign-ups underway
text: Advertisement Registration for Fort Walla Walla Museumâ€™s Archaeology Kids Camp is underway. The camp, led by staff archaeologist Ashley Morton, will be 8:30 a.m.-3:30 p.m. Oct. 10 at the museum. . Campers age 9-12 will get practical experience surveying, mapping and identifying artifacts and learn about the past from cultural artifacts. Cost for the camp is $30 for nonmembers and $25 for members. The fee must be paid at the time of registration. Registration forms are available in person at the museum or by mail. Financial aid is available. For a form or more information, call 509-525-7703.
